chunk:
Savor Beauty Cherry Collagen Peel

Brand: Savor Beauty

Category: Exfoliant/Scrub

Ingredients: Cherry Juice*, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Juice*, Passiflora Edulis (Passionfruit) Fruit Extract, Lactobacillus Papaya Fruit Ferment Extract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Pisum Sativum (Pea) Peptide, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract & Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed

Extract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Pisum Sativum (Pea) Peptide, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract & Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Extract & Cell Culture Extract, Arctostaphylos Uva Ursi (Bearberry) Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Morus Nigra (Mulberry)

Leaf Extract, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Extract & Cell Culture Extract, Arctostaphylos Uva Ursi (Bearberry) Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Morus Nigra (Mulberry) Leaf Extract, Algae Extract & Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Pectin, Xanthan Gum, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Fruit Extract, Vanilla Oleoresin, Camellia

Root Extract, Morus Nigra (Mulberry) Leaf Extract, Algae Extract & Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Pectin, Xanthan Gum, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Fruit Extract, Vanilla Oleoresin, Camellia Sinesis (Green Tea) Extract, Glycerin, Water, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate *Certified Organic

Directions: Apply even layer to cleansed skin. Leave on 1-3 minutes. Remove with moist towel. Use once a week.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer
